// TEXCOORD                 1   xy          2     NONE   float

// Output signature:
//
// Name                 Index   Mask Register SysValue  Format   Used
// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// SV_TARGET                0   xyzw        0   TARGET   float   xyzw
//
ps_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb13[133], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s1, mode_comparison
dcl_resource_texture2darray (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t1
dcl_input_ps_siv linear noperspective v0.xy, position
dcl_output o0.xyzw
dcl_temps 6

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r5.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

add r0.xy, -cb13[109].yxyy, cb13[109].wzww
add r0.zw, v0.xxxy, -cb13[109].yyyx
div r0.xy, r0.zwzz, r0.xyxx
ftoi r1.xy, v0.xyxx
mov r1.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.z, r1.xyzw, t1.zwxy
eq r1.x, cb13[132].y, l(1.000000)
mov r0.w, l(1.000000)
dp2 r1.y, r0.zwzz, cb13[42].zwzz
dp2 r0.w, r0.zwzz, cb13[43].zwzz
div r0.w, r1.y, r0.w
movc r1.z, r1.x, r0.w, r0.z
mad r1.xy, r0.xyxx, l(2.000000, -2.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, 1.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.x, r1.xyzw, cb13[36].xyzw
dp4 r0.y, r1.xyzw, cb13[37].xyzw
dp4 r0.z, r1.xyzw, cb13[38].xyzw
dp4 r0.w, r1.xyzw, cb13[39].xyzw
div r0.xyzw, r0.xyzw, r0.wwww

// WATCH_DOGS2 soft shadows fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-soft-shadows -i --only-autofixed 7a5b3185eaca413c-ps.txt

add r5.w, r0.z, -r5.y
mul r5.w, r5.w, r5.x
mad r0.x, -r5.w, cb13[36].x, r0.x

dp4 r1.x, r0.xyzw, cb13[84].xyzw
dp4 r1.y, r0.xyzw, cb13[85].xyzw
dp4 r1.z, r0.xyzw, cb13[86].xyzw
dp4 r0.x, r0.xyzw, cb13[87].xyzw
div r0.xyz, r1.xyzx, r0.xxxx
div r0.w, cb13[129].z, cb13[119].z
log r0.w, |r0.w|
mul r0.w, r0.w, |cb13[119].w|
exp r0.w, r0.w
mad r0.w, cb13[119].y, r0.w, cb13[119].x
add_sat r0.z, -r0.w, r0.z
add r1.xy, cb13[110].zwzz, cb13[110].zwzz
mad r1.zw, -cb13[110].zzzw, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 2.000000, 2.000000), l(0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000)
mov r2.z, l(0)
mov r0.w, l(0)
mov r2.w, l(-3.000000)
loop 
  lt r3.x, l(3.000000), r2.w
  breakc_nz r3.x
  mul r3.x, r2.w, cb13[110].z
  mov r4.x, r0.w
  mov r4.y, l(-3.000000)
  loop 
    lt r3.z, l(3.000000), r4.y
    breakc_nz r3.z
    mul r3.y, r4.y, cb13[110].w
    add r3.yz, r0.xxyx, r3.xxyx
    lt r4.zw, r1.zzzw, r3.yyyz
    movc r3.yz, r4.zzwz, r1.zzwz, r3.yyzy
    lt r4.zw, r3.yyyz, r1.xxxy
    movc r2.xy, r4.zwzz, r1.xyxx, r3.yzyy
    sample_c_lz_indexable(texture2darray)(float,float,float,float) r2.x, r2.xyzx, t0.xxxx, s1, r0.z
    add r4.x, r2.x, r4.x
    add r4.y, r4.y, l(1.000000)
  endloop 
  mov r0.w, r4.x
  add r2.w, r2.w, l(1.000000)
endloop 
mul r0.x, r0.w, l(0.0204081628)
add r0.y, -cb13[121].x, l(1.000000)
mul r0.z, r0.y, r0.x
mad r0.x, -r0.x, r0.y, l(1.000000)
mad o0.xyz, cb13[130].xxxx, r0.xxxx, r0.zzzz
mov o0.w, l(1.000000)
ret 
// Approximately 0 instruction slots used
